name: Microzine 13
overview: From the manual: The Frog and the Fables: A Twistaplot. Match wits with Oxon, the evil wizard, to save the frog king, his courtiers, and yourself! If you fail . . . The Secret of the Sphinx: Solve a mystery by exploring secret rooms and passages in an ancient pyramid. What is the secret of the sphinx? Who's Who in Outer Space: A data base. Browse through this data base of 200 real and imaginary space personalities. Who was the first woman in space? What was Luke Skywalker's profession? This data base will tell you! Back Page: Solve puzzles, read letters, and laugh with Micro-Toon™ (an electronic comic strip!).
